cons: Limited opportunities to develop and grow, slow to see change, no money

job_title: Sales Floor Team Leader in London, England
pros:
- Meet positive and hardworking people
- Go overseas as a volunteer
- Safe and security support at all the times
cons: High management is not organised and they are not able to support properly all the volunteers. There is no career progression within the organisation and they will not even come back to you.

pros: Passionate, friendly and supportive team environment, all dedicated and driven by the same goals. Good balance of relaxed vibe and hard work. Involvement in a variety of personal and professional development opportunitues.
cons: Lack of progression opportunities. At times the salary didn't compensate for the heavy workload.
